A family hiking trip

A study date

Participate in outdoor activities

Connect with nature

Sunny

Unfavorable

Someone made me feel 
Ignored
Disrespected

Talked
Shared
Revealved

Unnecessary

Work on a solution

Listening to me

Offering support

my parent
my teacher 
my friend

appreciated

courage

sigificant contributions
successful career

guidelines

What do you think about ChatGPT's launch
I can tell you that ChatGPT is 
A significant development
A groundbreaking tool
A game-changer

In your opinion how does AI help us
AI can help us in various ways such as 
Automating repetitive tasks
Improving accuracy
Providing valuable predictions

On the other side what are the drawbacks of AI
Some of its drawbacks are 
Secrurity risks
Data privacy issues
Athical concerns

Why is ChatGPT a game-changer for AI
It has the potential to 
Reshape the landscape of job markets
Revolutionize the AI industry
Transform how we approach AI

What makes you think so
It represents 
A powerful tool for AI-driven
A breakthrough
A revolutionary leap

How can we turn this situation into an opportunity to grow
Certainly one approach could be 
Investing in employees training programs
Incorporating it into our work processes
Collaborating with other experts in AI
